#summary Mask DORIS file using snaphu output.
#labels Phase-Support,Help

=USAGE:=
	mask processName

=DESCRIPTION:=
 MASK is an internal ADORE command.  <br>
 It reads the mask file generated by snaphu, and masks the given process name.

=INPUT:=
 processName: 
	name of doris step to be masked. (i.e. interfero, subtrrefpha, subtrrefdem, filtphase)

=OUTPUT:=
  MASK will automatically rename the original DORIS output to `filename.notmasked`<br>
  The masked file will be named as the original output.
